::Halucigen::
Halucigen fought it at first then realized that it was pointless.
"Very well" he said letting the plant be implanted without any opposition.
"Just keep my skill programs intact....Please!."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Thomas <Kinger1984@y...> wrote:
>  A trap door opened underneath the bot. about 20 wires
> came out wrapping around his legs. Pulling him down.
> As he fell through the tunnels Guiledart spoke. "Im
> sure you can understand I would like some insurance."
> He popped into the chamber the door underneath
> shutting. The light comeing out scrambling his circuts
> and must put him unconsious. "Now we can reprogram you
> as Destron." A arm came out with a destron chip and
> began to inplant it into the bots brain.
> --- gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > ::Halucigen::
> > "Greetings...My name is Halucigen. I was talking to
> > Magmatron before
> > his departure and I have come looking to join you. I
> > like the way your
> > work. TRapping and threatning.  And don't worry...if
> > i really wanted
> > out my Corrosion Missiles would take care of that. I
> > would like to
> > speak with you in person." Halucigen replied calmly
> > his small 5 foot
> > frame standing very cofidently.

> > him

> > guiledart on

> > > your way out of there it will be futile. One
> > question.
> > > Why are you here?"
